website_summaries.verdict: A gorgeous pocket watch that has both numerous satisfied owners and some durability and quality concerns.
pros: Generates praise for its intricate looks that have been described as "stunning" – gold-embellished finish, skeleton design, vintage wood adornment, and Roman numerals
cons: Typical of mechanical watches, it requires daily winding
The small glass window pops out fairly easily
Some owners gripe about time inaccuracies

customer_reviews.title: give it a nice 'rich' appearance
customer_reviews.text: I viewed many pocket watches to find one with the right 'look'. The color scheme & design combined, give it a nice 'rich' appearance. I was looking for a costume prop piece & this fits the bill nicely. The softer/duller brass, woodgrain & roman numerals are perfect for more of an aristocratic, heirloom watch. So far the function has been flawless & even though I bought it for a prop, this is definitely worth the price for daily use. One drawback for me, and I think another reviewer mentioned..... the hands on the watch are too short. They are hard to see....hence the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Holmes Girl

customer_reviews.title: Set it and make sure it keep time correctly!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch as a gift for my husband. When I got it, I set the time and wound it daily as per instructions - never more than 15 winds. The watch ran over two minutes fast within a 48 hour time period. Unacceptable in a day and age when even inexpensive time pieces should be able to keep better time than that. I might have gotten a bum one though.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Lowman

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: Wish I could return or exchange
customer_reviews.text: "Got the watch for my father as a birthday gift in 2017. Looks great and good quality. However, after a year he followed instructions correctly (this isn't his only pocket watch).it just stopped working. Very disappointed..." Up above is my previous comment. I do say we are very happy with the company. Upon getting our feedback they went out of their way to personally email me and ask to replace the watch free of charge. It is very nice to see a company care about their customers. My father has had the watch for about a month or two now since getting it replaced and has had no issues with it since. Thank you again for replacing the watch!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Sylvander

customer_reviews.title: Lid's a bit thin, but the clockwork really moves.
customer_reviews.text: There is something cheap and flimsy-feeling in the lid and general weight of the watch but it seems sturdy and runs well enough, perfect for people who are required by their job to forgo their smartphones. It's more fun and easier to read than a wristwatch, though a digital watch would be easier still. That said, with the digital watch you don't get the very visible intricate clockwork. You can watch it move and listen to it for a satisfying feeling you don't get with newer timepieces.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Neis

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get it to hold time.
customer_reviews.text: It looks very cool. That's about it. It worked for a few days then stopped. Tapped it and it worked for a few minutes. Tapped again and it worked for a few hours. Not exactly a reliable timepiece. It went into the junk drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Martel

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great. Only small downside was the wooden ring on ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my father and he absolutely loves it! He was showing it off to all of our relatives. Both he and I were very impressed with the quality of the watch. Works and looks great. Only small downside was the wooden ring on the front was a much lighter color than in the picture, but that isn't a huge deal. Overall a very good quality pocket watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Barker

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. I wasn't expecting extremely high quality
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. I wasn't expecting extremely high quality... but this watch is so cheap looking, I would be embarrassed to give it as a gift. Plus there is something caught under the glass, obstructing view of the time. I definitely do not recommend, I'm returning it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money it’s a nice looking watch that’s reasonably accurate it’s not something you’d wear daily ... it’s more for snazzy shindigs
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Page

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! The chain however can rust if hit with liquid and sometimes it's hard to see the time face because of a lack of contrast. But otherwise it's looks awesome and it makes me feel more like the Monopoly Man when I wear it. Legit.
customer_reviews.author: Brahmology, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great built
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a cheap design, but this is a beautiful metal cased pocket watch, with a sturdy necklace chain. I get comments every time I wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil

customer_reviews.title: Great groomsmen gifts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a groomsmen gifts for my wedding. They arrived well ahead of the estimated shipping date, they all worked well, and they all looked really classy. The style fit perfectly with what we were going for with the wedding. I was tempted to keep one for myself! If you're thinking of getting this as a gift for someone, for a costume, or even just to have as a unique accessory, these have a great look while still being functional!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and very nice
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift and they love it. It arrived early which was nice. It looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: AaronSki Mac-e-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Wanted functional use
customer_reviews.text: A very lovely watch, has a nice vintage look and feel to it. It would have made a great gift but the biggest disappointment was that it did not work. My fault for not checking if it worked before hand but I wished I had received a watch that atleast does its purpose which is function. Other than that a great looking watch for display or just dressing up in general.
customer_reviews.author: Ylianette Serpa

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is amazing with this product
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks now gears get hung up. Customer support was emailing about issue. After talking with customer support about the issue with the watch they sent me a brand new. I would recommend this company to anyone looking for a new watch.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Klemish

customer_reviews.title: Pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this pocket watch for my husband for Christmas. He was really excited to get it! He likes the look of the watch and it keeps good time. We would recommend purchasing this watch.
customer_reviews.author: TheMimi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not too practical
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautiful pocket watch. Only complaint is the graphics on the face make the hands very difficult to see let alone read. Beautiful collection item but not very practical. Yes. I would buy this beautiful piece of art again.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hanks

customer_reviews.title: perfectly pleased
customer_reviews.text: just fantastic. the wood appears just a little lighter than in this photo. surprising quality for the price. will make an excellent bronze anniversary gift and the back is engrave-able.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: it won't wind and the directions were useless. I can't find the original packaging so there ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for a gift. It doesn't open, it won't wind and the directions were useless. I can't find the original packaging so there is no way to return it. Will not buy again. I didn't want to give any stars but it would not let be submit until I did
customer_reviews.author: melissa jones

customer_reviews.title: STILL GOING
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year ago for a stage play, and it still works. It’s very good for its price and arrived quickly. If it’s something that you want for it’s quality, you should try something more expensive. But if you want something that’s reliable and cheap, this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ruden

customer_reviews.title: Men's Pocket Watch
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift, and he really like it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ann

customer_reviews.title: Classic look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Just like the good old days. This watch has that same type of vibe. It’s a cool piece to use. Winds up or self winds.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Low cost= low expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I got what I paid for. Watch was delivered 10/13/2017 and quit working 11/24/2017. It was nice while it lasted. I ended up with a chain I might be able to use if I try again to carry a pocket watch.
customer_reviews.author: micurmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: ... for my brother as a graduation present and he LOVED it. Very classy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother as a graduation present and he LOVED it. Very classy watch and not to flashy.
customer_reviews.author: steven ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It's very beautiful and it keeps time very well. I like the fact that I don't need batteries for it. But don't forget to wind it. The whole watch is made great and I would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very bad. It stoped work quickly. But my my husband keeps it as my present, I was very embaras
customer_reviews.author: Avigal

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and quality
customer_reviews.text: 100 % satisfied with this product. Beautiful and feels sturdy in hand. I will be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: bryan merriwether

customer_reviews.title: They look really nice but don't keep time
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and neither work. They look really nice but don't keep time.
customer_reviews.author: Marciarita

customer_reviews.title: I brought it as a birthday gift and my friend loved it.
customer_reviews.text: It looks very classic. I brought it as a birthday gift and my friend loved it.
customer_reviews.author: GG Xiao

customer_reviews.title: Will be nice to wear it when I get dressed up
customer_reviews.text: Catchy elegant design. Will be nice to wear it when I get dressed up.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter for next Christmas. It’s a really nice looking watch for both men and woman.
customer_reviews.author: jean shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Dont forget to keep it running
customer_reviews.text: It really accents the look and life style I lead, it is a great accessory to an outdoorsman like myself. Sturdy chain and clasp, about 12-15 hrs. on the run time, I've had a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came in an elegant box, well packed. I received it on time. I'm very happy with this purchase, the watch is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Quequetaza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Accurate as of now.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Not like anything that could be found on the market for the price. Let's see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service  can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: Update customer service fantastic, had problem with watch, they replaced it with no return needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hunley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product worth the wait.
customer_reviews.text: Came in great condition, a beauty to have in your pocket and for a great price. Though it took some months to get here, but it did get here and I am not disappointed. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Austin Sestito

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! Super Fun! Used as a prop in a photo shoot...great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AmyMarieS

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my son and he absolutely loved it. I was impressed by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: J Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch that works great and arrived fast and safely packed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nikky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy for the price and beautiful. Only needs to be wound perhaps every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. The intricate gears and cogs are stunning and the soft ticks are quite soothing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Wooooooow, this is niiiice! Came with instructions and everything. Nice and heavy, too. What a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Virgman

customer_reviews.title: Pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: Really love the look and style of the watch. Bought it as a gift for my husband he really loved it. It arrived 2 days earlier than expected
customer_reviews.author: Regina Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It keeps accurate time. The hands are difficult read since they are small and black.
customer_reviews.author: Albert L Eichelberger

customer_reviews.title: I gave it as a gift.  he liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: it is a good looking watch. It came in a nice gift box
customer_reviews.author: barbara weisser

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't adjust the clock. Couldn't wind it too. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Shervin

customer_reviews.title: this watch looks better than pictures
customer_reviews.text: In person, this watch looks better than pictures! But to the keen eye.. you can tell how cheap it's manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stringham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We were VERY happy with the purchase. They were purchased for wedding party gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He really liked it a
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my husband as a Valentine's gift. He really liked it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My groomsmen loved them, the windup feature was great and so was the look and feel
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Luciany

customer_reviews.title: Multiple compliments!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! It really adds some extra flare to a suit and vest. I have had multiple compliments. The watch looks really cool too. Definitely worth the couple of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Petros Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, broke quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I have to redo my review. When the watch arrived, I was very pleased with it. It kept good time, and was of very nice fit and finish. Then, yesterday it broke. Only about 10 days after I received it. Stem winder broke, so I can't wind it, and it is stuck so it only changes the hands. Kinda sad. I liked the watch! Fit and finish is why I give it 2 stars. Would have been 5 if it hadn't broken so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Herman

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. Ordered on 13 th delivered on the 17th. Made very well. Keeps good time. Looks cool because you can see the inner workings.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Meeker

product_meta.title: VIGOROSO Men's Hand-Wind Mechanical Pocket Watch Vintage Steampunk Wood Grain Hollow Design with Chain and Box
product_meta.description:

    *  #37 inMen's Pocket Watches 
    *  #42070 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars110 ratings
feature_bullets: Looking for a amazing Christmas gift for your Dad / Husband / Brothers / boyfriend / teacher ...? Look no further, this VIGOROSO pocket watch is a perfect gift for Christmas / Birthday / Anniversary / Valentine’s Day and any meaningful days. Accurately express your fully love. The bronze tone pocket watch is also a beautiful necklace decorating you, and a clothes chain matching your sweaters, dresses, and shirts.

SPECIAL DESIGN - Half Hunter Wood and Bronze Steel Case, Bronze engraved hollow case, Special skeleton mechanical dial with golden movement, Yellowish dial with black Roman numerals. Looks very Elegant, Smart, Vintage and fashionable! Suitable for all types of people. Also a good choice decorating you.

BATTERY NEEDLESS - Mechanical hand-wound movement. Don’t need battery. Twisting the top button on the spin, tightening a walk for 30 hours. Please wind up the watch before every usage, Keep the watch away from magnet to avoid making the watch stop working.

GOOD QUALITY - 100% brand new with excellent workmanship, Precise mechanical movement, Elegant case with long chain (approx 36cm / 14”), Good touch feeling. Fit for casual environment and business occasion.
VIGOROSO pocket watch. New in Black VIGOROSO Gift Box.
